729476f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Lafayette Avenue
729476f-a.text:
e86 Richmond Terrace, adjoing the S.E. corner of
lafayette Avenue, showing the Brandon Stevens Institute. The
house was owned in 1874 by W. F. Gray and in 1898 by Mrs. Lozier.
July 7, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729476f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Lafayette Avenue, Staten Island, NY
